ID1.Name: Horologium Core
ID1.Description: Refine your game modding process with the Horologium Core modding API, a prerequisite for mods featuring HorologiumCore in their zip name. HoroCore empowers you with limitless possibilities, enabling unlimited modifications to your game mechanics and rules. Elevate your gaming experience and delve into the realm of boundless creativity with ease.

ID2.Name: Stretched Resolution
ID2.Description:
Allows you to play with any resolution without black bars and with fixed HUD position

UPDATE: now you can choose option to apply desired resolution only in game (not in entire PC like you did via NVIDIA Contol Panel)How you can do it:

1. Press Win+R and paste the following path:

%localappdata%\DeadByDaylight\Saved\Config\WindowsClient\Engine.ini  if you are on Steam%localappdata%\DeadByDaylight\Saved\Config\EGS\Engine.ini  if you are on Epic Games

2. In the opened notepad window, navigate to the end of file and paste the following lines:

; How resolution being specified {Resolution_X}x{ResolutionY}{Tags}
; Examples: 1920x1080f | 800x600w | 3840x2560wf
[/Game/StretchedRes/Settings.Settings_C]
bForceScreenResolution=True
ScreenResolutionSettings=1920x1440f

3. Change the resolution value and window mode as you wish and save Engine.ini file

ID3.Name: Emote Wheel (1.0)
ID3.Description:
The default keybind for opening the emote wheel is 'B'. To cancel an emote while it's playing press 'V'.
By default, use the scroll wheel on your mouse to change the page in the emote wheel while it is open.

ℹ You can not start an emote while another one is playing. Other players can not see you emoting.

You can change the keybinds by putting this on a new line at the bottom of your Engine.ini file:


[/Game/AthenaEmoteMod/WBP_EmoteWheel.WBP_EmoteWheel_C]
EmoteWheelKey=B            ; key to use emote wheel (hold down)
EmoteCancelKey=V        ; the key to cancel an emote
ScrollUpKey=MouseScrollUp    ; key to scroll up in the emote wheel
ScrollDownKey=MouseScrollDown    ; key to scroll down in the emote wheel

To reach your Engine.ini file, press Win+R and paste the following path depending on if you're playing on Steam or Epic Games:
Steam: %localappdata%\DeadByDaylight\Saved\Config\WindowsClient\Engine.ini\Epic Games: %localappdata%\DeadByDaylight\Saved\Config\EGS\Engine.ini

ID4.Name: Invisable Cosmetics
ID4.Description: Invisable cosmetics for mods that use one mesh

ID1.Name: lobby killer detector
ID1.Description:
This mod determines which killer is currently in the Lobby, his addons, nickname and Steam profile (if he is playing on Steam)

Click on the Steam icon to open Killer's Steam profile.


LAST UPDATE:
25.07.2023 - add addon icons and description

ID3.Name: Homo Sapiens Skeleton
ID3.Description: Intricately designed skin showcases the skeletal structure of our species, allowing you to embody the essence of human history.

ID4.Name: Iron Maiden Cheryl
ID4.Description: 'Iron Maiden' T-Shirt for Cheryl: This classic grey cotton T-shirt features striking graphic of their iconic mascot 'Eddie'

ID6.Name: Coldwind farm corn remover
ID6.Description: Removes all corn in coldwind farm

ID1.Name: [HoroCore] FOV Slider
ID1.Description: This allows you to set your Field Of View mid-game using a slider, you can press Y to bring the menu on/off, there is also a reset button to put it back to 90. You can @ me for any questions/bugs report.

ID4.Name: Purple legacy feng
ID4.Description: Replaces one of the base cosmetics with some cool purple legacy

ID5.Name: Bikini meg
ID5.Description: Changes some of megs base cosmetics into a sexy bikini

ID8.Name: Goth heather ( cheryl mason / custom slot )
ID8.Description:

You need to use invisible cosmetics for this mod !
